newsitem.title: USA: TriNet seeks public offer of six mln shares.
newsitem.headline: TriNet seeks public offer of six mln shares.

text.p: TriNet Corporate Realty Trust Inc said it would make a proposed public offering of six milion shares of its common stock, none of which will be sold by shareholders.
On Tuesday the company reported fourth quarter profits of $0.64 a share, compared to a loss of $0.27 in the year-ago quarter.
The company reported having 13.9 million shares outstanding.
It said underwriters would be granted an over-allotment option for 900,000 shares.
Donaldson Lufkin & Jenrette Securities Corp is the lead managing underwriter.
